thread.title: Bollywood flashback: Remember Nimrat Kaur in these music videos?
thread.title_full: Bollywood flashback: Remember Nimrat Kaur in these music videos? - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Bollywood flashback: Remember Nimrat Kaur in these music videos?
text:
A grab of the song 'Tera Mera Pyar' 
Nimrat Kaur has made a name for herself in Bollywood with acclaimed roles in films like ‘The Lunchbox' and ‘Airlift'. But, do you know she had featured in a few music videos more than a decade back, during her early days in showbiz.
In 2002, she was seen in ‘Tera Mera Pyar', sung by Kumar Sanu. Remember the song?
Watch Video below  


A grab of the video Yeh Kya Hua 
In 2004, a second part of the video was released with the song, ‘Yeh Kya Hua', sung by Shreya Ghoshal. 
Watch Video below 

Kaur portrays Rebecca Yedlin in the American television series Wayward Pines.
Also Read: Smokin' hot! Nimrat Kaur's bikini photos go viral
